body_html: I see. In the future it's typically best to submit to master first and then ask us to cherry-pick the changes into the appropriate release branch. That way we avoid the situation where we merge into the release branch but end up forgetting to merge into master.
body_text: I see. In the future it's typically best to submit to master first and then ask us to cherry-pick the changes into the appropriate release branch. That way we avoid the situation where we merge into the release branch but end up forgetting to merge into master.
body: I see. In the future it's typically best to submit to master first and then ask us to cherry-pick the changes into the appropriate release branch. That way we avoid the situation where we merge into the release branch but end up forgetting to merge into master.
